Welcome to our restaurant!

Taste of the Islands features authentic cuisine from around the Caribbean, using the freshest ingredients to create what promises an unforgettable culinary experience.

Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

Kimberlee F:
five star review by 
I was scrolling through restaurants in the area since I don't live on this side of town. This restaurant came up with great reviews so I decided to give them a try. I'm sooo glad I did! I ordered the curry goat and it was so DELICIOUS. I didn't have to add salt or pepper to my food. It was very reasonably priced and I will definitely return! Service was fast and friendly!

Review by - Google

Dynamic D:
five star review by 
Wonderful atmosphere and people. Oxtail tender and full of flavor. Would highly recommend. The patties are delightful and always fresh . Good pricing especially compared to other places .

Review by - Google

Jason K:
five star review by 
Great comfort food ! Generous portions . Had the curry chicken. Had takeout but was in a hurry so sat at the bar for a quick bite.

Review by - Google

Nikki B:
five star review by 
This restaurant is soooooo good! I have not one complaint!! Staff is amazing, the food is amazing, the location is amazing, and the atmosphere is amazing!! I will be back again and again and again!!

Review by - Google

a walker:
five star review by 
The food was delicious. I stopped by for the desert. The sweet potato pie was delicious. There was a live band as well. They were very good. They were singing a variety of songs, 80s to present. I highly recommend. 10/10.
